resources.string: Olauncher promises to use lock screen permission responsibly.
Tip: Start typing an app name to auto-launch it
If double tap lock disables fingerprint or face unlock, open Olauncher settings, tap on \'experimental\' and follow the instructions. Thank you.

How it works: 
Once you double-tap, screen will go dark and the phone will lock itself in 5 seconds. 

During this time, you can double-tap to unlock or triple-tap anytime to fully lock the phone immediately. 

Note: Turn this OFF first if you decide to delete Olauncher. Thank you.
Double tap to lock enabled. \n\nNote: Turn this OFF first if you decide to delete Olauncher.
Our About page on the bottom has answers to all your questions. Don\'t forget. :) \n\nThank you.
Hey, do you find Olauncher useful? If yes, a 5-star rating is the best way to support us. \n\nThank you and you won\'t see this again.
Hi, do you think your friends would love Olauncher as much as you do? \n\nShare the app and help us spread the word. Thank you!
Hi, keyboard is the fastest way to find and launch apps in Olauncher. Can we request you to keep this On for a few more days and then decide? \n\nThe choice is always yours.
The accessibility permission is required to enable double tap to lock. Any data acquired by Olauncher via this service will not leave your device.
lock layout description to be used a unique id to lock screen
Support Olauncher for free by using our Amazon affiliate link.
Every time you buy something using our link, we get a small commission. Please save the link and use it whenever you shop online.\nThank you!
Please set Olauncher as your default launcher first
Tip: Start typing for app RENAME option
Note: Tap on \'Olauncher\' at the top of this Settings page to find your hidden apps.\n\nMore details available in our About page below.

Please turn on Olauncher\'s accessibility service in Android\'s settings to use this feature. \n\nThis service is only used to let you quickly turn off your device\'s screen using the double tap gesture. Our accessibility service does not collect or share any data.
